segments.text: Anne , would you please come in for a while ? Please also bring along the minutes of yesterday's management meeting .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course , sir ... Here's the minutes of the meeting .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How long did the meeting last ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The meeting was delayed by thirty minutes and it lasted for two and a half hours .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Did the chairman ask for me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I told him that you were very ill and couldn't attend .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right . Have you handed in my report to him ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I did . Besides , here are all the reports and materials handed out in the meeting . I think you'll have to do some replies .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you , Anne . You've done an excellent job . Did they mention the date for the next meeting ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , they didn't . The chairman said he would send a memo to all managers by the end of this week informing them of the date of the next meeting .
segments.speaker: S2
